Hi all,

I'm new to REST, and I just ran across a slide presentation about =
how xlink:role could be the 
key to automating the selection of xlinks from=
 an xml message to traverse to a new URI and 
therefore a new state.

There=
 is not a lot of info out there on xlink:role.  How exactly would this be d=
one?  Is this 
something done in javascript to extract the role info and th=
en decide what URL to follow 
next?
